name: Nature
description: Natural spirits and monsters belong to the Nature family. These monsters are tied to the forces of nature in ways more deep than normal animals like those in the Beast family.

name: Beast
description: This is a family of monsters that are more animalistic than most. Beast monsters are notable for their ferocity and primal instincts.

name: Aquatic
description: The Aquatic family is full of monsters from the ocean. These monsters are all mostly things you could see at a coral reef, and some are deep sea creatures. The deep, deep ocean monsters are under a different family.

name: Humanoid
description: These are your base humanoid races in typical fantasy games.

name: Construct
description: Artificial monsters created by enchanting objects. Typically strong and without any affinity for elements.

name: Abberations
description: "Weirds" and other monsters that don't derive from real life analogues

name: Undead
description: Creatures that are puppeteered and sustained using the forces of unlife

name: Radiant
description: Creatures that embody the forces of light / holy whatever

name: Earthen
description: Monsters that derive from the elemental force of earth

name: Infernal
description: Monsters that are derive from the elemental force of fire

name: Abyssal
description: Monsters that derive from the elemental forces of water

name: Tempestuous
description: Monsters that derive from the elemental forces of air
